messages.title: Laura Gordon - The Choice You Can Trust
messages.content: Laura Gordon and the Liberal Democrats are leading the fight for better politics in Britain. Laura Gordon is a campaigner determined to get a better deal for Sheffield.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Defending our NHS and schools from further Conservative cuts.
Demanding a People's Vote on Brexit to give you the final say.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The best way to get an MP you can trust is to vote Lib Dem.

issues.brexitEurope: Demanding a People's Vote on Brexit.
issues.health: Defending our NHS and schools from further Conservative cuts.

community.content: Sheffield Council's secret policy for tree-felling revealed.
